collectible.title: Ini's Beret
collectible.subtitle: Made from the world's finest industrial strength fabrics.
collectible.text: "Hey! This is all I have left! Yeah, I wanna give them my beret! AFTER I get all my clothes back!"

collectible.title: Lollipop
collectible.subtitle: It's cherry!
collectible.text: Aww... Was this lollipop supposed to be for you? My bad. I guess it was supposed to be your reward for being a good loser today.
